@sk8rdude461 wrote:

i dupe alote:

I searched “Debug” In my server and I can’t find it anywhere.

Something has to have it. Or you could change that line to:
public static boolean DEBUG = true;

item.title: Bebug;
item.dc:creator: @i_dupe_alote i dupe alote
item.description:
@i_dupe_alote wrote:

This is in Settings.txt
public static boolean DEBUG;

This is in my ObjectHandler

	if (Settings.DEBUG)
		Logger.log("ObjectHandler", "examined object: " + id+ ", x: "+x+ ", y: "+y);
}

I’m new to rsps 742s and it looks like I can Examine a object and see all of this. Except I don’t know how to DEBUG the setting or w.e Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
